merged.Anterior Chamber Inflammation: Results from immune-mediated attack on ocular structures in uveitis.
merged.Autoantibodies: Generated as a result of systemic immune dysregulation and autoimmune activity.
merged.Colonic Ulcerations: Develop due to inflammation and immune attack on the colonic mucosa in colitis.
merged.Diffuse Rash: Results from immune-mediated inflammation of the skin in dermatitis.
merged.Electrocardiogram (ECG) Changes: Result from electrical conduction disturbances due to immune-mediated myocardial inflammation.
merged.Elevated Creatinine: Indicates renal impairment due to immune-mediated nephritis.
merged.Elevated Liver Enzymes: Results from immune-mediated hepatocyte damage in hepatitis.
merged.Elevated Serum Lipase/Amylase: Indicate pancreatic inflammation due to immune-mediated pancreatitis.
merged.Ground-Glass Opacities: Caused by immune-mediated inflammation of the lung parenchyma in pneumonitis.
merged.Hemolytic Markers: Reflect immune-mediated destruction of red blood cells in hemolytic anemia.
merged.Hypoxia: Results from impaired gas exchange in the lungs due to pneumonitis or other pulmonary involvement.
merged.Neurological Abnormalities: Result from immune-mediated inflammation or damage to central or peripheral nervous system tissues.
merged.Pituitary Enlargement: Caused by immune-mediated inflammation of the pituitary gland in lymphocytic hypophysitis.
merged.Pleural Effusion: Develops secondary to inflammation or cardiac dysfunction related to immune-mediated myocarditis or pneumonitis.
merged.Proteinuria: Caused by immune-mediated damage to the renal glomeruli or tubules in nephritis.
merged.Reduced Hormone Levels: Result from immune-mediated destruction or dysfunction of endocrine glands, such as the thyroid or adrenal glands.
merged.Skin Biopsy Inflammation: Caused by immune-mediated attack on skin cells, leading to dermatitis.
merged.Synovitis on Imaging: Caused by immune-mediated inflammation of the synovial membrane in arthritis.
merged.Thrombocytopenia: Caused by immune-mediated destruction of platelets or suppression of their production in the bone marrow.
merged.Troponin Elevation: Reflects myocardial injury from immune-mediated inflammation in myocarditis.
